caption.p: Concentrations of two plant structural biopolymers lignin (A) and cellulose (B) in root dry mass of Picea abies seedlings in the three studied microhabitats before (month 0) and after decapitation (months 2â€“15). Bars indicate means ( n = 8) and whiskers represent standard errors. Different letters indicate significant differences among different sampling times within the same microhabitat. The values of cellulose are only indicative of relative differences among treatments, not corresponding to absolute values due to the method used.
